instructions: Put the plate in the center of the charger.
Put the napkin vertically in the middle of the plate
Put the fork on the left of charger with its tines pointing up
Put the salad fork on left of dinner fork
Put the dinner knife on right of charger with its blade facing the charger
Put tea spoon on right side of knife.
Put soup spoon on right side of tea spoon.
Place the water glass slightly above the space between knife and charger.
Place the wine glass slightly to right of water glass.
Place second wine glass slightly below the first wine glass.
Set the coffee cup slightly above and to the right of soup spoon.
Place the bread plate above the forks.
Place the butter knife horizontally across the middle of bread plate.
Place the dessert fork horizontally above charger, its tines pointing toward the glasses
Place the dessert spoon below dessert fork, pointing toward bread plate.
